name: bsZENITH PLUS
description:
NEW MAP NOT MADE YET!

"BS ZENITH plus" is a top-down shooter.

Aliens have broken into the ZENITH, a spaceship on its way to planet C-4629.

You play as the last remaining crew member who must remove all the aliens from the ZENITH.

NEW CONTENT:

  • Redesigned Map: "THE ZENITH"
    • You are the last crew member on the ZENITH, the rest have been devoured by the ravenous creatures on the ship. After breaking into the ship's armory, you must use the plasma weapons that have been left to eradicate the remaining creatures on the ship.
      • EASY MODE
  • New Map: "THE PLANET"
    • The ZENITH has crashed down on planet C-4621. After you have landed on the planet, you must eradicate the violent creatures that populate the planet, ravenous beasts intent on killing you.
      • HARD MODE
